law.text: After carcass disposal, cleaning, and disinfection has been completed, the board shall execute a voucher upon the Finance and Administration Cabinet for the amount of the indemnity due the owner, for payment from funds appropriated for this purpose. The voucher shall be approved by the state veterinarian and the chairman of the board. When the check for payment is issued by the State Treasurer, he shall forward it to the chairman of the board who shall pay it to the owner.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 13, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1990. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 63c-7.
